metadata.synopsis: Dialog for the shopkeeper of the armory store in the Rivington, next to the smithy. Reactivity if the smith is missing/player killed him.

29.speaker: Exxvikyap
29.text: Back again! Wanna dagger? Or a bow? Need more arrows? Need a spear?

39.speaker: Exxvikyap
39.text: Hiiiiiiiii! Want a blade? Or a bow? Or a dagger?

69.speaker: Exxvikyap
69.text: Or maybe a spear is more your thing?

10.speaker: Exxvikyap
10.text: You look like you know how to use a spear. Buy a spear, whaddya say? Huh?

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Are you the one that sells the smith's weapons?

30.speaker: Player
30.text: Are you the one that sells the smith's weapons?

84.speaker: Exxvikyap
84.text: On the outside, but he's a softie at heart! Like molten steel. Also, he's a living legend.

103.speaker: Player
103.text: Great. I'd like to look at what you've got for sale.

34.speaker: Exxvikyap
34.text: Aww we were just getting to know each other... well. Byeee!

111.speaker: Player
111.text: Tone down the excitement, will you? You're giving me a headache.

81.speaker: Exxvikyap
81.text: Sorry sorry! I just get so excited doing the BEST JOB EVER.

109.speaker: Player
109.text: You're certainly a lot less creepy than your boss.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: You're certainly a lot friendlier than your boss.

113.speaker: Exxvikyap
113.text: Aw shucks. That's so sweet of you to say! Don't judge Gyldro too harshly though - he's a busy man. A living legend.

87.speaker: Player
87.text: Really? Customer service is your idea of the best job ever?

24.speaker: Exxvikyap
24.text: Yuh-huh! I get to talk to people all day and work for the best damn smith in all of Rivington - Gyldro Angleiron.

41.speaker: Exxvikyap
41.text: D'you know he's won Best Smith in Rivington seven years in a row?

45.speaker: Exxvikyap
45.text: And AND he says that if I move enough stock, I might even get to have a go on the anvil!

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Quite the little arse-licker aren't you?

57.speaker: Exxvikyap
57.text: It's Gyldro Angleiron for gods' sakes! If you knew how good he was, trust me, you'd feel exactly the same way.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: So where is this amazing boss of yours?

67.speaker: Exxvikyap
67.text: Right up the stairs in his workshop!

23.speaker: Exxvikyap
23.text: But I wouldn't bother him if I were you - he doesn't like to be disturbed when he's in the zone.

74.speaker: Exxvikyap
74.text: Is there anything I can help you with? Maybe a shiny shiny new blade?

20.speaker: Player
20.text: I'd check up on your boss if I were you - he's having a bit of a rough time.

25.speaker: Exxvikyap
25.text: Oh. All right! Yep! I just gotta find a way to bother him - heh - without... actually bothering him...

12.speaker: Exxvikyap
12.text: He doesn't like to be disturbed when he's in the zone, see.

36.speaker: Exxvikyap
36.text: Is there anything else I can do for you?

38.speaker: Player
38.text: I'd pick a different dream if I were you. Your boss didn't seem the giving sort to me.

63.speaker: Exxvikyap
63.text: You don't know him like I do. The way he works the smelter, the tongs, the double-faced sledgehammer...
63.context: NodeContext: going weak at the knees with fangirldom

48.speaker: Player
48.text: So you want to be a smith?

58.speaker: Exxvikyap
58.text: I mean - I love what I do, don't get me wrong, but actually doing something with my hands, and all that fire...

98.speaker: Exxvikyap
98.text: I'd give anything to do what he does...

55.speaker: Exxvikyap
55.text: Oh gods - don't tell him I said that will you? I really love my job! Promise!

90.speaker: Player
90.text: Let's see if I can help boost your sales figures. Show me what you've got.

92.speaker: Exxvikyap
92.text: Want more? Want less? Wanna sell? Wanna buy? You know where I am. Byeeeeeeee!

78.speaker: Player
78.text: Well it's your lucky day. I've come to look at your wares.

46.speaker: Exxvikyap
46.text: Wait come back! I'm sorry if I came on too strong!

53.speaker: Player
53.text: A rather menial job you've landed, fledgling. What path has brought you to such service as this?

19.speaker: Exxvikyap
19.text: There's nothing menial about serving Gyldro Angleiron.

107.speaker: Player
107.text: I normally rely on my own hands for combat - but let's see what you have.

17.speaker: Exxvikyap
17.text: One of those stoic types, are ya? Well, I'm sure Gyldro's got something cooked up that even you can use.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: Got any wands? Magic items, maybe?

82.speaker: Exxvikyap
82.text: Dunno about wands, but everything Master Gyldro forges is magic! He's a master craftsman - see for yourself!

62.speaker: Exxvikyap
62.context: NodeContext: disappointed when she realises you're not who she thought you were

114.speaker: Player
114.text: You should know that Gyldro's not coming back.

59.speaker: Exxvikyap
59.text: What? Don't joke about that. He'll come back, he always does. He's probably just gone to get more coal for the forge, or visit one of the ore mines...

35.speaker: Exxvikyap
35.text: Not for you to worry about in any case - you're a customer. Is there anything I can do for you?

37.speaker: Exxvikyap
37.text: And no obituary in the Gazette? Impossible.

93.speaker: Exxvikyap
93.text: I don't know why you're insisting on spreading these nasty thoughts, but I'll ask you to kindly keep them to yourself.

100.speaker: Exxvikyap
100.text: Now, is there anything you'd like to buy? If not, move along.

16.speaker: Exxvikyap
16.text: You don't know Gyldro? Gyldro Angleiron? The smith? Really?

105.speaker: Exxvikyap
105.text: He's usually the first one in, but he's not shown up today. It's not the same without the sound of his bellows in the back...

106.speaker: Exxvikyap
106.text: And his stories... he tells the best stories...
106.context: NodeContext: dreamily disappearing into her own fantasies

22.speaker: Player
22.text: You were expecting Gyldro Angleiron? The smith?

14.speaker: Exxvikyap
14.text: He's just serious about his work.

2.speaker: Exxvikyap
2.text: That's a shame. You'd like him.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: You're quite a fan aren't you?

4.speaker: Exxvikyap
4.text: Oh. Well. Perhaps some of his exceptional weaponry might change your mind.
4.context: NodeContext: surprised that ANYONE could not worship Gyldro

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Just show me your wares please.

11.speaker: Exxvikyap
11.text: Come back soon. And if you see Gyldro tell him... tell him everything's under control.

115.speaker: Player
115.text: I do. He's not coming back.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: I just came to shop, if I'm honest.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: You were expecting Gyldro Angleiron? The smith?

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Ahem. I'm a customer. You should be delighted to see me.

61.speaker: Exxvikyap
61.text: What can I do for you?

110.speaker: Exxvikyap
110.context: InternalNodeContext: Smith is killed (by player, but shopkeeper doesn't know that) NodeContext: disappointed when she realises you're not who she thought you were
